text: Hey Thomas, quick question about your #2 request. Are you referring to this test in CCA? If so,  we do include email in there that is searchable, what makes searching by Record Id more preferable over email?
if a contact doesn't have a e-mail - HubSpot requires either email _or_ phone
:+1: good point. Thanks!
np

Hi All,

I am having a Custom object base workflow where custom object will be associated with more then 3000 contacts I want to send the email to all associated contacts using workflow but its ... "This email will be sent to all contacts associated with the enrolled trials. It will only be sent to up to 100 associated contacts"


can anybody provide the solution on this please ?
I would create a contact workflow that would send the emails to the contact if they are associated to the custom object
I want on custom object base Reason : Multiple contacts could have multiple Trail object associated as well
we have a prototype out right now that does away with the 100 contact restriction on the email action
I’ll ask the team the status of it and we might be able to release it to your portal
I’ve added this to our list of improvements to make so once someone frees up they can look into this.
you rock thank you so much
Hey Carter, circling back on this, is there any general expectation of how long a lambda would last in between workflow executions?
Nope not a lot of general consensus on how long you would use one lambda, they will switch often as HubSpot scales up and down to keep up with requests
Best things to do is to keep track of the count in an external database but the above is still not a bad option in a lot of cases
got it, thanks!
of course, sorry that there's no clear answer
the docs make it seem like it will last forever but after running in prod for a little bit I can tell you that's not the case
We are actively ungating the feature to customers so anybody that would like to have access, reach out to me with your HubSpot ID
pick me
<@U02EFVAAGCR> more than happy to show my use case in greater detail if needed, but would have to do it privately
(this should be available for everyone automatically over the next few weeks or so, fyi)
